lavish.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: a royal palace on a lavish scale
lavish.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: We were always lavish with financial aid in times of crisis.
He was always lavish in his praise of my efforts.
lavish.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to give someone or something a lot of love, praise, money etc
lavish.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Hug your children and lavish them with love.
